headline: Warren Buffett has secretly invested $5 billion into a mystery stock — and the trail leads to this industrial giant
summary: Detective work points to one stunning conclusion. Buy the stock or an industrial-sector ETF — but get ahead of Berkshire Hathaway’s big reveal.

headline: Buffett’s secret stock? WarrenAI thinks it’s found the answer
summary: Investing.com -- Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRKa) is set to file its latest 13F with the SEC after the close of trading today. With it, Buffett is expected to reveal a new mystery stock position he has been building a multi-billion-dollar stake in.

headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights Caterpillar, Komatsu, Terex and The Manitowoc
summary: Caterpillar weathers short-term earnings and tariff pressures with strong service growth and long-term demand drivers, while Komatsu outpaces peers in 2025 stock gains.

headline: Caterpillar Foundation Surpasses $1 Billion in Global Giving
summary: The Caterpillar Foundation, the philanthropic arm of Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE: CAT), has reached a historic milestone—donating more than $1 billion globally to improve lives and build stronger, more resilient, and sustainable communities around the world. This achievement reflects more than seven decades of impact.

headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Bullish on Caterpillar Stock?
summary: Caterpillar has modestly outperformed the broader market over the past year, with analysts maintaining a cautiously optimistic outlook on its future prospects.

headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 Facing Headwinds
summary: Large-cap stocks are known for their staying power and ability to weather market storms better than smaller competitors. However, their sheer size makes it more challenging to maintain high growth rates as they’ve already captured significant portions of their markets.

raw.headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 Facing Headwinds
